text: Va in ki az Parvardigoraton omurziş ʙixohed, sipas ʙa dargohaş tavʙa kuned, to şumoro [dar zindagii dunjo] to saromadi muajjane ʙa xajru xuʙī ʙahramand sozad va ʙa har ʙofazilate [ki jaktoparastī va nakukorī peşa kardaast, podoşu] fuzunī ʙaxşad.Va agar [az imon] rū ʙigardoned, [ʙidoned, ki man] ʙa rostī, ʙarojaton az azoʙi rūze sahmgin metarsam
